item.title: Control Yourself
item.description: Anyone that has contact with marketing execution or measurement, at some point in life, encountered a dilemma or a colleague that suggested: “How about we run this one without the control group hum?" And here we are, discussing why this is, sometimes, a topic for arguing on marketing daily’s and plannings. I understand that having a holdout group can be challenging, sometimes even impossible (I’ll have a post on alternatives later), but not having it is way more risky then one can imagine.
